definitions: To press or squeeze (something) with a force that destroys or deforms it.
To defeat or overcome (someone or something) completely.
To subdue or suppress (a rebellion, protest, etc.) by force.
To have a strong infatuation with someone.
examples: She watched him crush the can under his foot.
The team managed to crush their opponents in the final.
The government sent in troops to crush the uprising.
He's had a crush on her for months.
